text: ted” in 22,326 BC. January 2000 heralded confirmation of the 2000-2017 SAC, and the whole mess of the “Final Con- flict Drama” was rapidly brought to our earthly door. The present drama and its potential consequences are much more serious and potentially damaging than those first revealed in the “Zeta Ruled Society” probability depicted in Voyagers V olume-1. But we still have time to prevent this mess, if we get our collective human act together. Fear is the most useless, self-indulgent response we can choose to entertain; no one is going to “fix this for us” but ourselves, and if we are wallowing in fear like quaking ninnies we will guarantee our own defeat. Fear is a chosen response and so too is courage and calm, centered action; if necessary, allow a bit of natural fear to move through you and out, 253
